definition: to receive sth on another's behalf
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)

sentences.english: The Bank reserves the right to accept any order for collection only.
sentences.chinese: 本行保留仅以代收方式接纳任何付款指示之权利。

sentences.english: "The "presenting Bank"which is the collecting Bank making presentation to the drawee. "
sentences.chinese: 提示行，即向付款人提示单据的代收行。

sentences.english: The thesis introduces the design and implement of the charging and paying system .
sentences.chinese: 在本文中给出了代收付费系统的设计与实现方法。

sentences.english: In such cases, the remitting bank and collecting bank bear no responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 遇到这种情况，托收银行和代收银行是没有责任的。

definition: to sign for the acceptance of sth (e.g. a delivery etc)
to act for sb else/to act on sb's behalf/an agent/a diplomatic representative/a chargé d'affaires
to pay sb else's expense with the expectation of being reimbursed by that person later
to return (sth borrowed etc)/to send back/to refund/to rebate
